title: What do you have to do to get someone to look at an abandon house to get it torn down? This house is across from 7300 Darden Rd. I have lived right by this for going on 5 years and with all the new homes going up all around this house it is a degrading mess. Windows broken and just plain nasty. Have never seen anyone around it. Who knows what is inside.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2014/05/my-neighbors-house-and-yard-is-in-hideous-disrepair-whom-can-i-call/
